name: Pocket Soccer
overview: It's time to show your soccer skills! Pocket Soccer brings the world's most popular sport direct to the palm of your hand. Create your own team from more than 200 players or choose from 32 ready made teams, then work your way up the league in this fast paced game! Play head-to-head with a friend using the Universal Game Link cable (sold separately) or trade players in order to make your team the very best!
